text: Castile Run is a small tributary to South Fork Tenmile Creek in southwestern Pennsylvania. The stream rises in northeastern Greene County and flows southeast entering South Fork Tenmile Creek at Chartiers, Pennsylvania. The watershed is roughly 25% agricultural, 69% forested and the rest is other uses. ==References== Category:Rivers of Pennsylvania Category:Tributaries of the Monongahela River Category:Rivers of Greene County, Pennsylvania
title: Castile Run
